Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2016 08:30PM - edited Apr 28, 2016 09:12PM by inSF I've been absent from the boards for awhile since finishing chemo, having mx number two, and starting rads. I'm definitely struggling with this phase of treatment and the hair issue is finally really starting to freak me out. I shaved my head early in the process and actually had significant hair growth during taxol/taxotere (switched part way through). I am now more than 9 weeks pfc and have zero additional hair growing on the top of my head. I actually shaved my head again at 7 weeks because the male pattern baldness looked so bad, and it is not improving. I started just going out bald sometimes (doing hats the rest of the time), but I am starting to worry I will be in the small group with permanent hair loss. I guess I'm just looking for encouragement and some positive examples. Was anyone else nearly bald on the top of the head at 9 - 10 weeks pfc?
